author: freeCodeCamp.org
description:
Learn to play the guitar! This course teaches essential guitar theory including the fretboard, the major scale and the triads. It was created by baritone guitarist, @AlexGordonHiFi.

Download the free pdf files: https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1dUYwQOvoC6g5ex4ZQbbzvxQy3V7s4s-_

Sign Up For Private Online Lessons Here: https://www.tunelark.com/promo/alex

⭐️ Chapters ⭐️
- 0:00:00 Introduction
- 0:01:36 The Crux of Self-Contained Guitar
- 0:03:07 This Notion of Practice - part 1
- 0:04:57 Chapter 1 - THE FRETBOARD
- 0:06:00 The 12 Chromatic Notes
- 0:07:28 Half Steps & Whole Steps
- 0:08:37 Unisons & Octaves
- 0:11:33 Paperwork - The Fretboard
- 0:12:37 Fingerwork - The Fretboard
- 0:13:59 Fretboard Summation

- 0:14:13 Chapter 2 - THE MAJOR SCALE
- 0:15:25 The Major Scale Formula
- 0:19:13 Paperwork - The Major Scale Formula
- 0:19:33 Major Scale Intervals
- 0:21:44 Paperwork - Major Scale Intervals
- 0:22:04 Fingerwork - Major Scale Intervals
- 0:24:27 Major Scale Fretboard
title: Guitar Theory Course for Beginners – Learn Fretboard, Major Scale and Triads

author: freeCodeCamp.org
description: When you're job hunting, it's easy to feel exhausted and low energy. But if you can figure out how to tweak a couple things, you'll be able to stand out and move forward. Leon and Danny discuss this with Quincy on the freeCodeCamp podcast.
title: How to focus your efforts in the right directions when job hunting
